world.constructs.blocks

Class Block

  • java.lang.Object
    • world.constructs.blocks.Block
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Clippable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Barrier, BGBlock, BlockTemplate, Clay, Grass, Light, Sail, Stone, Teapot, Wood

    public class Block
extends java.lang.Object
implements Clippable
    Common superclass for all Blocks. When created, forms a "GRASS BLOCK"
    Author:
    Michael Ferolito,William Meng

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected boolean isSelected
      True if and only if the block is selected by the Player.
      protected MVector mv
      The position vector, used for transformations.
      protected double size
      The size of the block.
      static boolean TESSELATION_ON
      Suggests that the block add extra verticies to its drawing.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Block()
      Default for classloader.
      Block(double x, double y, double z)
      Constructs a block with the specified coordinates.

    • Field Detail

      • TESSELATION_ON

        public static boolean TESSELATION_ON
        Suggests that the block add extra verticies to its drawing.

      • size

        protected final double size
        The size of the block. Subclasses may choose to change this value.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • mv

        protected MVector mv
        The position vector, used for transformations.

      • isSelected

        protected boolean isSelected
        True if and only if the block is selected by the Player. Subclasses may need to be allowed access.
